casebody.data:
Before McCarthy, O’Dwyer and Schuchman, JJ.

Patrick A. Meehan, Respondent, v. The Traders and Travelers' Accident Company of New York, Appellant. Appeal from a judgment entered upon a verdict in favor of the plaintiff and from an order denying a motion for new trial. Abel Crook and Jacob Fromme, for appellant; Joseph A. Flannery, for respondent.

Judgment and order appealed from affirmed, with costs. No opinion.
